alert.note: Alert for Ohio (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 03 at 5:37AM EDT until July 03 at 2:43PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Louisville KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... Rough River near Dundee affecting Ohio County. .Heavy rain from the past two days will cause the river to rise. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO THIS AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rough River near Dundee. * WHEN...Until this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, County roads between Dundee and Narrows flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:45 AM CDT Monday the stage was 25.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 25.4 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage near midday. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 25.3 feet on 02/08/2019. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued later this morning.
